original_title: The Praise Baby Collection: God of Wonders
overview: Here's the second volume in the best-selling Praise Baby Collection. This interactive, developmentally appropriate line combines familiar Praise & Worship songs with proven early childhood development principles. Baby can get to know the Creator and have fun with mom and dad using music to stimulate and nurture creativity while providing a nurturing environment for baby's spirit and mind. Recommended for babies 1 to 36 months old.
tagline: Music for Baby's Spirit and Mind
title: The Praise Baby Collection: God of Wonders
